name: INGetVisualCodeIntent
desc: A request for a visual code to use for exchanging payment and contact information.DeprecatedThis intent is no longer available. You may define a custom intent instead. For more information, see Deprecated SiriKit Intent Domains.

items.name: init(visualCodeType: INVisualCodeType)
items.desc: Initializes the intent object with information about the requested type of code.

items.name: var visualCodeType: INVisualCodeType
items.desc: The type of visual code requested by the user.

items.name: enum INVisualCodeType
items.desc: Constants indicating the purpose of the visual code.
